Description: DJ GEAR INSTRUMENT GEAR LIVE SOUND RECORDING MICROPHONES HEADPHONES ACCESSORIES SOFTWARE LIGHTING BUNDLES Authorized Dealer - Full Warranty Sterling by Music Man AL40-BK-R1 Albert Lee Signature in Black - Used Sterling 6 String Electric Guitar in Black - Used - Description The Sterling by Music Man “Albert Lee” signature model features a retro offset body style equipped with a mahogany body with a comfortable Hard Maple neck and 2 Humbuckers with a 5-Way Pickup Selector. New for 2018, the Albert Lee is available in Black.
